column5: A buddy was asking if I new were he could take his safe gun test for hunting. He has his PAL Anyone know?? He lives in the Hamilton Burlington area. Thanks Guys
i've been looking into this lately as well.  the waterdown rod and gun club offers it, google for the link to the club
THE GUN CLUB ON KING RD IN BURLINGTON  ABOVE THE NORTH SERVICE RD
I have really got to get around to getting my PAL and Hunter's Safety Courses.........
You can Google it, there's a few that offer it right in Hamilton, Burlington, and Waterdown
